Label.en: The palace had already started to become full of art over the years, as the French kings accumulated their collection
Label.fr: Le palais avait déjà commencé à se remplir d'oeuvres d'art au fil des ans, tandis que les rois de France enrichissaient leurs collections
Label.es: The palace had already started to become full of art over the years, as the French kings accumulated their collection
Label.zh: The palace had already started to become full of art over the years, as the French kings accumulated their collection

Label.en: After all, what's a French king without a fancy palace full of art!
Label.fr: Après tout, à quoi ressemblerait un roi français sans un beau palais rempli d'oeuvres d'art qui en jettent !
Label.es: After all, what's a French king without a fancy palace full of art!
Label.zh: After all, what's a French king without a fancy palace full of art!

Label.en: But it was Napoleon who actually made it an official museum
Label.fr: Mais c'est  Napoléon qui l'a officiellement transformé en musée
Label.es: But it was Napoleon who actually made it an official museum
Label.zh: But it was Napoleon who actually made it an official museum

Label.en: I knew you were a revolutionary...
Label.fr: Je sentais bien chez toi l'amorce d'une la fibre révolutionnaire...
Label.es: I knew you were a revolutionary...
Label.zh: I knew you were a revolutionary...

Label.en: Anyway, it was Napoleon who actually made it an official museum
Label.fr: Quoi qu'il en soit, c'est  Napoléon qui l'a officiellement transformé en musée
Label.es: Anyway, it was Napoleon who actually made it an official museum
Label.zh: Anyway, it was Napoleon who actually made it an official museum
